title: Falling
description: Ceri thinks she sees angels… everywhere.Love is a powerful emotion, but can it change the course of someone’s destiny?This is a romance story that explores the possibility of there being something more than just the ‘here and now’.Ceri’s journey has begun. Part 1 of three novellas in the Angels Among Us seriesComing soon…Angels Among Us: ForbiddenAngels Among Us: Forever- See more at: http://www.harperimpulseromance.com/b...
author: Linn B. Halton
